long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING

This extension provides a debugging interface for analytics implementations, marketing pixels and Google Tag Manager Data Layer events. It offers two primary methods for debugging:

1. üõ†Ô∏è Dedicated DevTools Panel (AH Debugger)
   - Access a comprehensive debugging interface within Chrome DevTools. 
   - Advanced search and filter functionality to quickly locate specific metrics through complex request data.
      
2. üîç Console Integration:
   - View debugging information directly in the browser's console
   - Enhanced readability for quick and efficient validation of analytics data

3. üåê Wide Platform Compatibility
- Google Analytics 4
- Adobe Web SDK
- Google Tag Manager
- Marketing Pixels:
   - Google Ads
   - Facebook
   - Bing Ads
   - TikTok
   - Pinterest
And more...

We prioritize your privacy - we don't view, collect, or store any of your debugging logs or any other data while you use the extension.

To ask for support get in touch with us via the form at https://assertionhub.com/#contact and select "Support - Assertion Hub Debugger"

This extension is currently in beta. We're actively developing new features and improvements based on user feedback. Stay tuned for more updates!
